title: Good Game.
body:
http://i.gyazo.com/e94a699ed872905269b17a1c65fb37de.png

Also thank you bless Riot for the Rune page not changing and I realized at the last second.

replies.body:
The Chinese guys wrote,

First guy: "This idiot Jinx mid"
Second guy: "And use Heal....."
Second guy: "boom"

Not sure what's the second guy's problem with people running Heal lol, it's not bad imo, anyways.

Yer the rune page thing happens from time to time, BL.

Nice rune page name though.
